subtests.name: Sanitizer.sanitizeFor() should throw.
Sanitizer.sanitizeFor() with one argument should throw.
Sanitizer.sanitizeFor("script", ...) should fail.
Sanitizer.sanitizeFor("iframe", ...) should fail.
Sanitizer.sanitizeFor("object", ...) should fail.
Sanitizer.sanitizeFor("div", ...) should pass.
Sanitizer.sanitizeFor function shouldn't load the image.
Sanitizer.sanitizeFor(element, ..)
Sanitizer.sanitizeFor("div", "Hello") obeys parse context.
Sanitizer.sanitizeFor("div", "data") obeys parse context.
Sanitizer.sanitizeFor("template", "Hello") obeys parse context.
Sanitizer.sanitizeFor("template", "data") obeys parse context.
Sanitizer.sanitizeFor("table", "Hello") obeys parse context.
Sanitizer.sanitizeFor("table", "data") obeys parse context.
